channel.title: Stop Posting your aryans updated my mopar's updater!
channel.description: It's quite annoying for the people actually posing as smarter people than they are :rolleyes:

item.title: Stop Posting your aryans updated my mopar's updater!
item.dc:creator: @xPLaR xPLaR
item.description:
@xPLaR wrote:

omg if you cant update your own aryan now you dont deserve to use it. its 2 clicks and like 10 mins of your time to update it. run it and go make a sandwich come back and its done. we dont need 10 ppl posting their update every time there is a new one. they will all be the same with maybe their name on the title bar.

Read full topic

item.title: Stop Posting your aryans updated my mopar's updater!
item.dc:creator: @sh4d0ws sh4d0ws
item.description:
@sh4d0ws wrote:

Weasel, either you have a mental disability or you’ve smoked too much marijuana. He’s suggesting that whoever updates Aryan themselves, with mopar’s two click updater, shouldn’t make a post about it. We don’t need it, all it causes is spam and arguments.
